_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ContractNotice.description: A document used by a Contracting party to announce a project to buy goods, services, or works.

ContractNotice.title: Contract Notice. Details
ContractNotice.description: A document used by a Contracting party to announce a project to buy goods, services, or works.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Contract Notice. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Contract Notice. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Contract Notice. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Contract Notice. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Contract Notice. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Contract Notice. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Contract Notice. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Contract Notice. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

IssueDate.title: Contract Notice. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Contract Notice. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Contract Notice. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

RequestedPublicationDate.title: Contract Notice. Requested_ Publication Date. Date
RequestedPublicationDate.description: The requested publication date for this Contract Notice.

RegulatoryDomain.title: Contract Notice. Regulatory Domain. Text
RegulatoryDomain.description: Information about the law that defines the regulatory domain.

FrequencyPeriod.title: Contract Notice. Frequency_ Period. Period
FrequencyPeriod.description: The estimated frequency of future notices.

Signature.title: Contract Notice. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Contract Notice. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party
OriginatorCustomerParty.description: A party who originally requested the tender.

TenderingTerms.title: Contract Notice. Tendering Terms
TenderingTerms.description: The tendering terms associated with this tendering process.

TenderingProcess.title: Contract Notice. Tendering Process
TenderingProcess.description: A description of the tendering process itself.

ProcurementProject.title: Contract Notice. Procurement Project
ProcurementProject.description: An overall definition of this procurement project.

ProcurementProjectLot.title: Contract Notice. Procurement Project Lot
ProcurementProjectLot.description: One of the procurement project lots into which this contract can be split.
